sentences.en: Accept the rules stated above or discontinue your studies.
sentences.cn: 要么接受以上的规定,要么就停学.
51 路公共汽车目前停止运营。

sentences.en: Discontinue use and consult your doctor if any adverse reactions occur.
sentences.cn: 如果有不利反应发生,立刻停止服用并咨询医生.

sentences.en: Discontinue use and consult your doctor if skin sensitivity occurs.
sentences.cn: 如果皮肤有敏感的情况出现,咨询医生.

sentences.en: Discontinue use if irritation occurs in conjunction with other products.
sentences.cn: 如果配合其它产品感觉不适,请停止使用.

sentences.en: Discontinue use when your supply begins to level out.
sentences.cn: 当供需平衡时停止服用.

sentences.en: Do not discontinue the treatment without consulting your doctor.
sentences.cn: 未经医嘱不要擅自中断治疗。

sentences.en: Farfrae duly received the request to discontinue attentions to Elizabeth - Jane.
sentences.cn: 伐尔伏雷当然收到了那封请他同伊丽莎白 ― 杰恩断绝来往的信.

sentences.en: He asked them to discontinue flights over the island.
sentences.cn: 他要求他们停止在该岛上空飞行.

sentences.en: If the skin becomes broken discontinue use of our product.
sentences.cn: 如果皮肤出现破损,请停止使用我们的产品.

sentences.en: In case of discomfort, please discontinue use and consult your doctor.
sentences.cn: 如果有不适感, 提议您暂停使用或资询您的皮肤医生.

sentences.en: It was decided to discontinue the treatment after three months.
sentences.cn: 三个月后决定终止治疗。

sentences.en: The airline says this route is no longer economic, so they're going to discontinue it.
sentences.cn: 航空公司说这条航线不再赚钱, 因此他们准备关闭.

sentences.en: They threatened to discontinue buying it.
sentences.cn: 他们威胁说要终止这桩买卖.

sentences.en: We would like to discontinue our current telex connection.
sentences.cn: 我们要停用我们的电传线路.

sentences.en: Why do you discontinue compiling your dictionary? Don't you think it a pity to give it up when it is nearly completed?
sentences.cn: 为什么你不继续编纂你的词典 呢 ?功亏一篑,你不觉得可惜 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 不连续；中断；间断性；断绝

trans.tran_cn: 停止； 中断； 不连续
trans.tran_en: to stop doing, producing, or providing something
